pages.title: Kulfi
pages.extract: Kulfi  is a popular frozen dairy dessert from the Indian subcontinent. . It is popular throughout India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Nepal, Burma (Myanmar), and the Middle East, and widely available in Indian restaurants in Australia, Europe, East Asia...

pages.title: Ice cream parlor
pages.extract: Ice cream parlors (or parlours) are restaurants that sell ice cream, gelato, sorbet, and frozen yogurt to consumers. Ice cream is typically sold as regular ice cream (also called hard-packed ice cream), gelato, and soft serve, which is usually dispensed by...

pages.title: Sorbet
pages.extract: Sorbet , is a frozen dessert made from sweetened water with flavouring (typically fruit juice or fruit pur√©e, wine, liqueur or, very rarely, honey)....
